VL Log Lines¶

class vlog.VLogLine(original_line)¶

Abstract base class for all other log line elements.

classmethod set_max_line_len(max_len)¶

Sets the maximum length of the VLogLine string.

Parameters:max_len (int) – Max number of chars in VLogLine string.
parse_fields(unf_str)¶

Parse the unformatted string into the various fields and create the appropriate VL objects.

Note: This method is abstract.

Parameters:unf_str (str) – Unformatted VL log line
classmethod get_pattern()¶

Returns the regex pattern that is used for identifying VL log objects.

Note: This method is abstract.

Return type:str
